title: 820-3332 Display issues....
message:
Hello, 

This is the lovely GPU issue.  Everything is super clean no liquid no damage, I have done all the standard measurements and all is fine.  Here is a pic of the display and what it is doing. Just thought I would toss this out here to see if anyone has dealt with this exact issue.  Taking a break and will return to this soon, if anyone has some pointers on what to tackle next let me know.  would greatly appreciate any tips.  Oh and yes, I have cleaned up U8900.  

Thank you,
Mike

title: 820-3332 Display issues....
message: RAM, VRAM, GPU, CPU or broken internal trace. Going to be a waste of time tbh
